title: New York woman shouts after being filmed following crash
title_page: New York woman shouts after being filmed following crash | Daily Mail Online
text:
A woman involved in an accident that saw a car crash through a gas station convenience store in New York was filmed in a fit of rage as at least two passersby recorded the aftermath on their smartphone videos.
The incident, footage of which was uploaded to YouTube on Tuesday, involved a woman who appears to be in her 20s or 30s confronting two men who came upon a Mobil gas station at an intersection in New York.
The men had taken out their smart phones and started recording just moments after the driver of what appears to be a white Kia SUV rammed her vehicle into the façade of a convenience store.
Judging by the reaction of the woman, nobody appears to have been seriously hurt.
A woman involved in an accident that saw a car crash through a gas station convenience store in New York was filmed in a fit of rage as at least two passersby recorded the aftermath on their smartphone videos
Judging by the woman's reaction, nobody was seriously hurt in the accident
Still, the curiosity of two passersby appears to have enraged one woman who knew the driver, though the nature of their relationship is unclear.
When one of the men started recording on their smartphones, the woman got angry.
‘Yeah, take pictures, you dumb a****,’ she yelled.
‘You all aren’t even a part of this.’
The passersby were nonetheless stunned at what they were seeing, with one of them exclaiming: ‘Oh, Jesus.’
The incident, footage of which was uploaded to YouTube on Tuesday, involved a woman who appears to be in her 20s or 30s confronting two men who came upon a Mobil gas station at an intersection somewhere in New York
As the two men kept filming, the woman became aggravated and accosted them in a threatening manner
The woman then began to get aggravated as the men kept filming. She yelled epithets and then flashed a middle finger.
‘I like that finger, too,’ one of the men said in response.
The men seemed to become more amused as the woman became angrier by the moment.
‘It was an accident, you dumbasses! How about you get a f***ing car yourself?’ she yelled at the men.
‘This is crazy,’ one of them is heard saying in stunned amazement as they both continued to capture the scene on their smartphones.
‘You’re recording me for what reason, sir?’ the woman says.
At one point, she began to give chase after one of the men, who continued filming her while laughing and taunting her
The man seen above was filming the woman who was heard cursing and yelling as more and more passersby stopped to see the crash scene
One of the men is then heard saying that the video footage was going to be uploaded to social media, which only enraged the woman further
When one of the men replies: ‘She almost killed people,’ the woman shot back: ‘She didn’t kill nobody. It was an accident.’
‘How about I come and kick the phone out of your hand right now, dude?’ she said, taking steps toward them in a threatening manner.
‘You really want me to?’
At this point, she begins to chase the two men down the block.
‘How about this? How about you run, b***h?’
She then gives chase as one of the men stays a few paces ahead of her while filming her the whole time.
‘Come at me, b***h. Come at me.’
‘I’ll f***ing kill you and your motherf***ing ass,’ she said to both men before lunging at the other.
The men are heard laughing and taunting the woman, telling her: ‘You’re in big trouble.’
One of the men is then heard saying that the video footage was going to be uploaded to social media.
The video then captures a number of other passersby who witness the scene of the crash.
The woman then appears to be grow even angrier as more and more people take an interest.
She then removes what appears to be a metal object of some sort and starts to chase the men down once again.
